For people like AtiGamer, who can`t launch the game at all: I got it to work. After installing it several times without a successfull launch I installed the game to the default directory d/games/crysis 3 for me. I had to rename the letter of the partition for the duration because I had D for different use, but it works afterwards when I changed it back too. I also copied the mounted images content to my harddisk before installing, but I don`t thing that matters... After that, by using the provided instructions of the reloaded release the game launched for me. Hope this works for someone. Peace.

plessure:

try this:

2. Open Internet Explorer (this will only work with Internet Explorer, not other browsers). Enter the following address into your address bar and press "Enter/Return"

C:ProgramDataElectronic ArtsEA ServicesLicense

3. Delete the file named either 71067.dlf or 70619 or 71069.dlf (i deleted everything)

4. Restart your machine.


let me know if this fix your problem.
